net.sf.libai.nn
Class NeuralNetwork

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.libai.nn.NeuralNetwork
Direct Known Subclasses:
Competitive, Hebb, Hopfield, Kohonen, MLP, Perceptron
public abstract class NeuralNetwork
extends java.lang.Object

Neural network abstraction. Provides the methods to trains, simulate an calculate the error.

Author:
kronenthaler

Method Detail

setPlotter

public void setPlotter(Plotter plotter)

setProgressBar

public void setProgressBar(javax.swing.JProgressBar pb)

train

public abstract void train(Matrix[] patterns,
                           Matrix[] answers,
                           double alpha,
                           int epochs,
                           int offset,
                           int length,
                           double minerror)
Train this neural network with the list of patterns and the expected answers. Use the learning rate alpha for many epochs. Take length patterns from the position offset until the minerror will be reach.

Parameters:
patterns - The patterns to be learned.
answers - The expected answers.
alpha - The learning rate.
epochs - The maximum number of iterations
offset - The first pattern position
length - How many patterns will be used.
minerror - The minimal error expected.

simulate

public abstract Matrix simulate(Matrix pattern)
Calculate the output for the pattern.

Parameters:
pattern - Pattern to use as input.
Returns:
The output for the neural network.

simulate

public abstract void simulate(Matrix pattern,
                              Matrix result)
Calculate the output for the pattern and left the result in result.

Parameters:
pattern - Pattern to use as input.
result - The output for the input.

save

public abstract boolean save(java.lang.String path)
Save the neural network to the file in the path

Parameters:
path - The path for the output file.
Returns:
true if the file can be created and written, false otherwise.

open

public abstract boolean open(java.lang.String path)
Open the neural network from the file in the path

Parameters:
path - The path for the input file.
Returns:
true if the file can be created and readed, false otherwise.

Parameters:

answers - The expected answers.
alpha - The learning rate.
epochs - The maximum number of iterations

Alias of train(patterns, answers, alpha, epochs, offset, length, 1.e-5);

Parameters:
patterns - The patterns to be learned.
answers - The expected answers.
alpha - The learning rate.
epochs - The maximum number of iterations
offset - The first pattern position
length - How many patterns will be used.

error

public double error(Matrix[] patterns,
                    Matrix[] answers)
Calculate from a set of patterns. Alias of error(patterns, answers, 0, patterns.length)

Parameters:
patterns - The array with the patterns to test
answers - The array with the expected answers for the patterns.
Returns:
The error calculate for the patterns.

error

public double error(Matrix[] patterns,
                    Matrix[] answers,
                    int offset,
                    int length)
Calculates the mean cuadratic error. Is the standard error metric for neural networks. Just a few networks needs a diferent type of error metric.

Parameters:
patterns - The array with the patterns to test
answers - The array with the expected answers for the patterns.
offset - The initial position inside the array.
length - How many patterns must be taken from the offset.
Returns:
The mean cuadratic error.

Returns:

gaussian

public static double gaussian(double u2,
                              double sigma)
Calculate the Gaussian function with standard desviation sigma and input parameter u^2

Returns:
e^(-u^2/2.sigma)
